discussiontools-error-comment-is-transcl: He achhyna he alei awpa ta "{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" link he ahmâh thei vei.  Châ alei awpa ta "$1" kha hmiena chôta hmia bie taopathina kha hmâh bei teh.
Hmia hropa tawhta awpa ta khâpa a châpa vâta he châ aleina he achhy awpa ta "{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" link hecha ahmâh thei vei. Châ alei awpa ta [[$1]] lâ he vawh bei teh.
tag-discussiontools-source-description: BiepachianaChhaichhia cha hnawh môd lia a y
tag-discussiontools-visual-description: BiepachianaChhaichhizy cha hmôna môd lia a y
